text: If Home Assistant becomes unreachable, check whether the host is responding using 'ping <ip>'.
Home Assistant logs are available under Settings → System → Logs or via the container logs if running in Docker.
If Home Assistant is slow or unresponsive, check integrations that spam the event bus or polling-based devices.
If an integration stops working, remove and re-add it. Many HA integrations cache stale authentication tokens.
Yaml configuration changes require a reload or restart of Home Assistant to take effect.
Automations failing silently often indicate missing entity IDs or renamed devices.
